Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/Canal
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Roosevelt, Clark, 18th, Halsted, and Archer due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Canal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via State, Roosevelt, Clark, 18th, Halsted, and Archer due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Canal. 

Allow extra travel time.
